name: Laser Protector
description:
I ran out of time, so you have to Alt-F4 to leave/restart the game. =/

(It's a top down shooter game where you can't control the source of the shooting)

So here's this dumpster fire.  You control a mirror with WASD/Arrow keys & flip it with the space bar or left mouse.  You must deflect the auto-firing laser to destroy enemies while trying not to get hit by said enemies.

I'm pretty sure you have to click the mouse before you can move the mirror.

I spent like the entire time getting the laser to work (more or less properly), so everything else is a bit... unpolished.

Sound effects from soundbible.com

Everything else was regrettably made by me.
